pageContext.claim:
“No. No. What else?...Well, you'll have to ask Michael Cohen. Michael is my attorney. And you'll have to ask Michael Cohen.

....No, I don't know. No.”
pageContext.analysis: Responding to a series of questions from reporters, Trump denied he had any knowledge of a $130,000 payment made to porn star Stormy Daniels by his attorney Michael Cohen in the weeks just before the 2016 election. On May 3, Trump admitted he had known about the payment and had repaid Cohen. After Cohen's guilty plea, the Fact Checker labeled this statement to be "a lie."
